paragraphs.title: Deploying Applications: Spring
paragraphs.text:
%md # Deploying Applications Splice Machine is an ACID compliant RDMS, which means that you can build Spring applications on it. One such application is the commonly-used *Petclinic* web app.
## Running the Petclinic Web App Here are links you can follow to download and run the Splice Machine/Spring implementation of the Petclinic app. You can:
Access the repository: https://github.com/splicemachine/spring-petclinic
Download a JDBC driver to use with it: https://s3.amazonaws.com/splicemachine/artifacts/db-client-2.6.1.1736.jar
Download an ODBC driver to use with it: https://www.splicemachine.com/get-started/odbc-driver-download/

The Petclinic app uses the same basic Java persistence model as traditional databases, as shown here.
